instruction: Explain the implications of the phrase "knowledge is power".
output: The phrase "knowledge is power" implies that having access to information and using it wisely can lead to gaining power and influence. Knowledge gives us the ability to make better decisions and take action on those decisions that can lead to success. Knowledge gives us the power to shape our lives, communities and world. It allows us to think critically, accurately assess situations and come up with the best solutions to problems. It also gives us the ability to evaluate the opinions of others and determine whether or not they are valid.
